member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Client.SendEmail(Text,JsonObject)
member.summary: Send email using Outlook API. If the message json parameter <= 4 mb and wrapped in a message object it is sent in a single request, otherwise it is sent it in multiple requests.
member.error: User is external and cannot authenticate to the exchange server.
member.param: The JSON representing the email message.
